bibl.title: Structure in Roman economic and social history in honour of Allan Chester Johnson
bibl.note: Archives d'Aurelius Isidôros, propriétaire terrien de Karanis, fin du IIIe-début du IVe siècle p.C. - P. Cairo Isidor. 128; 73.
Boak A.E.R., "Tesserarii" and "Quadrarii" as Village Officials in Egypt of the Fourth Century.
Studies in Honor of Allan Chester Johnson (Princeton, 1951) pp. 322-335.
